colorTheory.description: This color palette combines a professional and modern look with high readability.
colorTheory.mood: The colors convey a sense of professionalism, trustworthiness, and modernity.
colorTheory.accessibility: The high contrast between text and background colors ensures good readability for all users.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary color (#00A99D) stands out as the main brand color, complemented by a clean background color (#FFFFFF) for readability. The secondary color (#FFFFFF) provides a stark contrast for elements, while the accent color (#333333) adds depth and visual interest. The success color (#FFC107) distinguishes positive states from the primary color.
